name: REST API Extended
author: TanaponBB

sections.description: Extends WordPress REST API with ACF Options and GTM Tracking endpoints.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files
  2. Activate the plugin
  3. Ensure ACF is installed
sections.changelog:
1.4.0

  • Added Signed URL support for secure downloads
  • Improved auto-update system

1.3.4

  • Fixed GTM Options Page not being created

upgrade_notice: Version 1.4.0 - Secure download system with Signed URLs.
